dietList.introduction: Let's be honest, most nutritionists do not at all welcome such emergency ways of transforming the figure, in particular because the lost kilograms can return just as quickly. Nevertheless, often representatives of both sexes are looking for a way to quickly transform the body in front of some If you are one of them at the moment and are just looking for a method to reduce your forms as quickly as possible, we suggest that you familiarize yourself with the options for a strict diet that promise to lose weight as soon as possible. They last from 3 to 14 days and eliminate 4-5 (and more) kilogram.
dietList.menuText: The diet is often called dynamic, because it helps to dynamically say goodbye to the accumulated excess weight. The main purpose of this diet is to cause a stressful situation in the body and thereby push it to lose weight.   nSince with strict diets, the intake of nutrients into the body is sharply reduced, it is recommended to drink a course of vitamins. It is better to do this even before the diet, in order to prepare the body for restrictions in advance. But since most people decide to turn to a strict diet shortly before it, start drinking vitamins at least simultaneously with its start.   nAccording to the rules of a strict seven-day dynamic diet, for which you can lose up to 5 kg, you need to eat three times a day. Focus on healthy foods such as boiled or baked meat, fresh juices, non-starchy vegetables, berries. It is best to carry out this diet in summer, since dinner provides for the use of berries, and get healthy products of this type in the warm season about most of all.

Potatoes have a beneficial effect on the nervous system, and it also increases mental performance.
cons: Among the disadvantages of this kind of diet, it is worth noting that some feel weakness and malaise. Also, the disadvantages include the fact that, ideally, you need to lose weight on young potatoes. Therefore, this can be done efficiently and correctly only during the period of its harvest.

dietList.hintText: Please note that at the beginning of the Bonn soup diet, weight tends to go away more quickly. The plumb lines become less noticeable later on. This is normal and should not scare you. Everything is going according to the Bonn plan.
dietList.introduction: If your goal is both weight loss and proper nutrition (PP), then this one based on the use of Bonn soup will be an excellent choice from many methods of losing weight. It lasts 7 days, during which, as a rule, it is possible to throw from 2 to 6 kilograms of excess body fat. The result of losing weight depends on what your body weight is at the start of the diet.
dietList.menuText: Bonn soup is prepared from the most common vegetables. You will need:   - white cabbage (500 g);   - cauliflower (300 g);   - carrots and celery (170 g each);    - onions (150 g);   - a bunch of green onions;   - garlic (20 g);   - 300 g of fresh tomatoes;   - 1.5 liters of water;   - ground coriander, cumin and curry ( 1 tbsp. l.);   - dried red hot pepper (1 pod);   - 2 bay leaves;   - vegetable bouillon cubes (2 pcs.);   - 1 tsp. soy sauce;   - parsley, ginger, cilantro;   - some vegetable oil for frying (better than olive oil).   Slightly fry the white onion and chopped green onions in rings in a skillet with butter. Now add the indicated amount of curry, garlic and cumin , stew everything over low heat. Cut carrots and celery into cubes, chop white cabbage, pick cauliflower inflorescences, chop tomatoes and send all this together with frying to a saucepan, pouring water. Boil for about 10-15 minutes. Then add coriander, vegetable cubes , lavrushka, chopped pepper pod and all other seasonings. Now we bring the soup to readiness, until all the vegetables are fully cooked. It is advisable not to salt the soup or add a little salt.   nDuring the diet, you can only eat Bonn soup, eating it in small portions when you feel hungry. If you cannot boast of truly iron willpower, then you should not test your patience and psychological attitude. On each of the dietary days, it is allowed to include other products in the diet, in addition to the signature dish. They, too, like soup, should be consumed when hunger appears, but still controlling the impulses of your appetite.   nOn the first day, any fruits are allowed, it is not recommended to eat only bananas. On the second day, we eat green vegetables, but at dinner you can afford one boiled or baked potato with a drop of vegetable oil. On the third day, we eat any fruit and vegetable products (but today we do not eat potatoes). On the fourth day, according to the rules for losing weight in Bonn soup, it is allowed to eat bananas (no more than three pieces) and drink some low-fat milk. On the fifth day, the liquid dish is accompanied by a small amount of lean chicken breast or fish, fresh tomatoes. On the sixth day, along with the soup, it is allowed to include in the menu a lean beef chop (or simply this boiled meat) plus any vegetables (except potatoes). And on the seventh diet day, you can eat brown rice and non-starchy vegetables.   nDrink at least 2 liters of water and your favorite tea (preferably herbal or green) without sugar every day. All other foods and drinks, if you want to lose onerous pounds, now need to be eliminated.
dietList.resultText: Weight loss up to 6 kg in 7 days.

dietList.introduction: In addition to special nutrition for transforming the legs and the whole body, we recommend that you pay attention to a few additional tricks that will help you get the desired shape as soon as possible. Walk a lot and go swimming. Such aerobic exercises are not burdensome and enjoyable, they develop the muscles of the legs remarkably. Moreover, the muscles of the extremities work even when you are just lying on the water. The body receives energy released from oxygen. As a result, glucose interferes with the oxidation process, fat is burned more actively, the mood improves, and the body happily loses weight. Is it not a miracle? n   Drink water correctly! Very often fat deposits in the leg area, and throughout the body, are the result of improper drinking regime. We have repeatedly heard that you need to drink enough fluids daily. But in order to quickly get rid of excess fat in the leg area and reduce the appearance of unattractive cellulite, we recommend that you pay attention to more one trick. Drink liquid regularly: 2-3 times an hour, 20-30 milliliters. This drinking behavior promises to speed up the metabolism as quickly as possible and push the weight loss process you are striving for. The so-called ethnic teas (Chinese pu-erh, Paraguayan mate) will also be a good helper from liquids. When brewed correctly, these drinks not only help to pacify an uncontrollable appetite, but also accelerate the breakdown of fat, improving lymph flow, which is very important in this situation.   nWear corrective underwear. Corrective underwear, as well as slimming tights, can correct the imperfection of the figure. Such clothes can not only create a more attractive figure, beautifully processing the line of the knees, hips, ankles. If the linen is made with high quality, then it still has an anti-varicose effect and helps to eliminate the negative consequences of a sedentary lifestyle.   nUse a self-tanner. Try to feel the effect of artificial sun on yourself and you will notice that the skin has not only become darker and more attractive, but also your legs have visually lost weight. However, it is important to note that in order to apply self-tanning, you need to have certain skills and abilities. Therefore, for beginners in this business, it is better to use toning wipes, which have a similar effect.   nTry to work while standing. Do you work in an office? Do at least part of your office work without sitting. Ask yourself the question: Do you need to sit during all of your work? Most likely, the answer will be no. So take action, sometimes all ingenious is really simple.   nDo scrubbing. This cosmetic procedure is easy to carry out at home. Pamper your calves and thighs with a scrub, it is very useful. This method improves the microcirculation of lymph and blood, helps to get rid of many dead skin particles, makes the skin more elastic and helps to better absorb the effect of any subsequent procedure (mask, wrapping or just applying a cream).
dietList.menuText: Of course, any problem is easier to prevent. So that the legs do not rush to increase in volume and do not increase the chances of meeting cellulite, which often makes the fair sex sad, you need to monitor your daily diet. Pay attention to the list below and try as you can rarely communicate with food that has a place in it, if you want to achieve beauty and slender legs and a figure in general.   nPastry. Mouth-watering buns, fatty cakes and other similar products from pastry are recognized as the most dangerous. It has a high nutritional value and with frequent ingestion, it increases body weight and causes formations from the orange peel. Often at work, with a busy schedule, people snack on purchased pies, pizzas and all kinds of pastries. This behavior is a direct road to unpleasant body changes.   Sugar. In addition to harm to the figure but it also worsens the condition of the skin, and can become serious if used excessively. rose for health. So it is highly advisable, if you cannot drink coffee and tea that are completely unsweetened, replace sugar with natural honey, or at least use brown instead of white sugar. According to the opinion of many doctors and scientists, 100 grams is considered the acceptable daily value of sugar. But it's important to understand that this applies not only to pure sugar, but also to the hidden sweetness found in many foods.   Fast food. All fast food is harmful, to which you can also add sausages and other sausage products. This also includes semi-finished products, for the preparation of which you need to spend a minimum of time, which is why so often people indulge in them.   Coffee. It has been scientifically proven that drinking coffee can also form an unattractive crust on the thighs. This is, first of all, about the soluble form of this drink. If you have cellulite, but find it difficult to completely give up coffee, leave it in your diet in a small amount (limit one or two cups a day) and switch to ground coffee.    â€¢ Alcohol. Not to mention the harm to the body of alcoholic beverages in large quantities, their consumption has an extremely negative effect on the figure. For example, various liqueurs contain a large number of calories, and a second pile of such a drink is often equated in nutritional value to almost a full meal. And beer, which is consumed by so many people, involves the accompanying absorption of a large amount of fat for a snack, and after that not only extra centimeters appear on the legs, but also a beer belly and other privileges grow.   Chocolate and sweets. Everyone knows that chocolate improves mood. But for this effect, it is very important to have willpower and stop eating about 30 grams of this sweet with a high cocoa content. Otherwise, it is unlikely that it will be possible to avoid gaining extra pounds and meeting with cellulite formations. Use topical chocolate more often. Do, for example, a hot anti-cellulite body wrap or other useful procedure.   Salt. You need to consume it, but in a minimal amount. After all, it is famous for its ability to retain excess fluid in the body, and this leads to deformation of the fat layer. The main results of this are puffiness, which increases the body in volume, cholesterol plaques and deterioration of the kidneys.   To make the legs lose weight, a special diet will help. Its main motto is the introduction into the diet of the maximum amount of food that is useful for the figure and the body, the rejection of harmfulness. Every day you need to drink at least 1.5 liters of water, and from other drinks, focus on unsweetened green tea, hibiscus, freshly squeezed vegetable and fruit juices.   nInclude in the menu raw, boiled and baked vegetables and fruits, berries, rich in vitamin C (strawberries, black currants, rose hips, mountain ash, sea buckthorn, etc.), foods rich in potassium (potatoes, honey, grapes, avocado, broccoli, milk). An important place in the diet aimed at acquiring attractive and slender legs is also given to such gifts of nature as watermelons and melons. They perfectly help to remove unnecessary fluid from the body, burn the hated fat. An alternative to fatty meat products, which is now recommended to be abandoned, is its low-fat analogue (for example, chicken meat).

And this is not surprising. After adding just a couple of centimeters in volume, a girl can be removed from the show for this. with the strictest criteria and, as a result, lose your job. dietList.menuText: The longer model diet lasts for 7 days. It is often followed by even eminent fashion models to get their bodies perfect before an important show. dietList.hintText: If you feel hungry, snack on small amounts of fruits, vegetables (preferably non-starchy), drink fruit and vegetable juices. The dishes recommended in the menu can be replaced with others. The main thing is that they are vegetarian and similar in composition.
dietList.introduction: According to historical data, scientists assume that the yogis and Buddhists of Asia were the first admirers of vegetarianism. From there this system migrated to European countries. In the post-Soviet space, one of the first known vegetarians was the writer Leo Tolstoy. After him, this dietary system became widespread.   nIf just a few decades ago, vegetarianism meant a diet method in which people do not eat meat, now there are many different variations. The main types of vegetarianism include veganism, lacto-vegetarianism and lacto-vegetarianism.   n the strictest types of this food, according to the rules of which meat of animals and birds, fish, seafood, eggs, dairy and sour milk products are excluded from the menu.Many vegans deny themselves even honey.Lacto-vegetarianism is a type of food in which it is possible to exclude from forbidden foods milk and dairy products. lacto-vegetarianism means lacto-vegetable-egg vegetarianism. In addition to milk, it is permissible to include poultry eggs from animal products in the diet.
dietList.menuText: The principles of a vegetarian diet, designed for 14 days, are similar to lacto-veganism. You can consume milk and eggs from animal products. If you have not previously dealt closely with vegetarianism, it is better to start with just such a type, so as not to shock the body with cardinal changes in eating behavior. If you are an avid meat eater, it is permissible even to include low-fat fish and seafood in the menu in small quantities. Make up your diet based on the main recommendations of the methodology and taking into account your taste preferences, characteristics and capabilities of the body.   nEat during a vegetarian diet for two weeks will need cereals, fruits, vegetables, berries, low-fat or low-fat dairy and sour-milk products.Also, recall the need to consume enough liquid - up to 2 liters of still water daily.It is also allowed to drink tea of â€‹â€‹any kind without adding honey and sugar ( except in rare cases that are described on the menu below), freshly squeezed fruit and vegetable juices. Although vegetarians are allowed to include some sweets in their diet, when following the rules of this method, it is better to exclude everything, leaving only occasionally a little honey. You are still losing weight.   nOnce you finish your diet, if you do not plan to become a vegetarian, gradually return to your usual diet. Add the previously forbidden foods little by little and do not get carried away with flour and sweets. Otherwise, alas, the weight lost with such difficulty can easily return. If you want to not only improve your body, but also decide to experience this way of eating and living on yourself, this diet can be a good start. If this is the case, continue eating the vegetarian diet of your choice, but increasing the calorie intake and crunching the meals.   nBefore switching to a vegetarian diet, we suggest that you learn the pros and cons. The undoubted advantage of vegetarianism is that it detoxifies the body in the most powerful way. Plant foods contain a lot of fiber, which gently and gently cleanses our body. And the ease of digestion of this type of product does not force the stomach to strain. Vegetarian food helps to normalize cholesterol levels and strengthens the immune system, helping to strengthen it. Also, a plus for the body is that vegetables, fruits, berries, grains contain a great variety of vitamins, phytoncides, minerals that have a positive effect on the work of many organs and systems.   nBut vegetarianism (especially in the hard version) has certain disadvantages ... People who adhere to it, suffering from a lack of iron entering the body, may become victims of iron deficiency anemia. There is also iron in plant foods, but it is poorly absorbed (when compared with that contained in animal products). Hence this problem may arise. Also, in a vegetarian menu, vitamin B12 may not be enough, which is why there is a possibility of encountering diseases of the nervous system. It is difficult with vegetarianism to produce some hormones and enzymes necessary for the body. If you refuse fish and seafood, as scientists note, cardiovascular diseases and vision problems (in particular, the development of cataracts, clouding of the lens) can develop. So if you decide to eat a vegetarian diet for a long time (or even always), take care of the delivery of vitamin B12 to the body, as well as taking a special complex with omega-3 fatty acids.

dietList.introduction: Most of the products from supermarket shelves, and those sold in the markets, contain chemicals that can harm the body. Usually nothing bad and tangible happens if a person ate a product with harmful additives once or twice. But with regular consumption of such food sooner or later in the body there is an excess of toxins.   nHow to understand that your organs are slagged? Signs of this negative phenomenon can be rapid fatigue, increased irritability and even aggressiveness. Also, the appearance of unattractive marks on It can be, in particular, acne, various kinds of rashes, dull skin color, inflammation of the sebaceous glands, etc.   nIn addition, signs of slagging of the body can be diseases such as rhinitis, conjunctivitis. about internal intoxication. If this problem appears, be sure to pay attention.   n Often due to the abundance the problem of excess weight is aggravated in the organism of harmfulness. For this reason, some cannot lose weight without even consuming a large number of calories or sitting on some kind of (non-slag) diet.   nAlso slagging can manifest itself by the appearance of bad breath, aching joints, decreased appetite, constant dryness in mouth and desire to drink water over and over again, sleep disturbances. In general, the spectrum of unpleasant manifestations of this problem is huge. If nothing is done, everything will not work out by itself. The accumulation of toxins can cause serious health problems: gastritis, colitis, angina pectoris and many others, up to oncology.   nTo improve the body's work, experts recommend resorting to a non-toxin diet. According to American doctors Shelton and Bragg, you need to eat only products that you have grown with your own hands, and the quality of which you have no doubt about. But since this condition is almost impossible to fulfill for residents of modern megacities, we suggest that you familiarize yourself with an alternative option - a slag-free diet, on which almost anyone can sit.
dietList.menuText: You just need to include in the menu products that contribute to the natural removal of toxins from the body. And the effect of weight loss is achieved, as a rule, due to the exclusion from the diet of foods that clog the body and at the same time are quite high in calories.   nSo, during while following the rules of a slag-free diet (and at normal times) should be excluded from the diet:    â€¢ fatty meat and broths cooked on it;    â€¢ smoked, pickled, salty foods;    â€¢ mushrooms;    â€¢ all sausages and sausages;    â€¢ canned food;    â€¢ all sorts of spices and sauces;    â€¢ chocolate and chocolate products;    â€¢ coffee and everything that contains caffeine;    â€¢ carbonated drinks;    â€¢ forget now also about alcohol, chips, crackers, fast food.   All this only weakens our body, bringing it harm and unattractive extra pounds.   nProducts for a slag-free diet should be chosen in terms of their maximum usefulness for the body. and aromatic additives.   n But include foods that are high in fiber. It will help the body get rid of toxins and toxins, and normalize the digestive tract. Fruits, vegetables, herbs, and cereals are excellent sources of fiber. Vegetable and fruit products are recommended to be thermally processed as little as possible in order to preserve the maximum of nutrients in them. From cereals, you can use everything except semolina and legumes. An excellent choice would be buckwheat, rice, oatmeal. Before cooking, it is recommended to rinse any of the cereals well, and then pour boiling water over and leave for an hour or two. After that, you can bring the cereal to readiness by boiling it for 5-7 minutes. Now, after wrapping it in a towel, leave it for another 15 minutes. This preparation helps to preserve the maximum amount of nutrients.   nIt is also important to provide the body with proteins. To do this, you should use lean meat, low-fat fish, egg whites, low-fat cottage cheese and kefir, low-fat hard cheese (not too salty).   nMeat and fish products should be steamed, baked or boiled. You don't need to combine it with porridge now. The rules of separate feeding come into force. An excellent side dish for meat and fish will be a vegetable salad with the addition of various greens.   nIt is recommended to eat at least 4-5 times a day. The portions should be small. Eat cereals and fruits for breakfast, meat and fish in the daytime, and in the afternoon and evening, give preference to vegetables and dairy products. All dairy products should be consumed separately while following the rules of a slag-free diet (without mixing, for example, with fruits and berries, as many are used to doing).

dietList.introduction: The lean diet is especially popular in Europe. This strict technique allows you to quickly and significantly lose weight, losing 5 to 10 kilograms of weight. dietList.menuText:
After choosing a skinny 7-day diet, be prepared to consume these products.
 First day: 1 liter of milk. The maximum fat content is 2.5% (or less fatty). If you do not want or do not you can drink milk, it is allowed to replace it with kefir (the requirements for fat content are the same).
 Second day: cottage cheese (200 g) with fruit juice without sugar (800 ml). Any juices are allowed, except for grape and banana.
 The third day is the strictest. We drink only clean water. Any food is prohibited.

 Sixth day: 200 g of lean boiled unsalted meat.

 Mandatory requirement is crushing meals. The first communication with food is in the next hour (maximum two) after waking up.

dietList.introduction: After reading the name of this diet, you may have thought that you will have to lose weight with the use of magic. But this is not at all so. Probably, the magic diet is named because it allows you to lose up to 7 kilograms of hated fat in a week. Every day from you. leaves a kilogram of excess weight. What is not witchcraft? Let's find out how it all works. This diet is classified by experts as low-calorie methods of body transformation. It is quite strict and is considered a type of protein diet. Weight loss occurs due to cutting back on carbohydrates and fats in the diet. . The body has to draw energy from internal resources, so it loses weight.
dietList.menuText: The magic weight loss menu needs to be planned carefully, since the dietary requirements oblige the inclusion in the diet of protein products that are low in fat and calorie content. So, in the list of products that are allowed for use on a magic diet, there were the following:   - the most low-fat cheeses: tofu, feta cheese, gaudette, grained;   - fruits: green apples, oranges, plums;   - vegetables: spinach, carrots, pumpkin, onions, broccoli, tomatoes, cabbage, celery, lettuce, zucchini , radishes, cucumbers;   - dried fruits (in priority prunes);   - chicken eggs;   - dairy and fermented milk products: cottage cheese and kefir, the fat content of which does not exceed 1%.   From drinks on this diet are allowed, in addition to pure still water, black coffee (preferably natural brewed) and tea (unpackaged green is recommended.) No sugar or milk should be added to any drinks. If desired, drink them as much as you like, but empty.   nNothing other than the above, sitting on magic You cannot eat or drink on a healthy diet, otherwise the result will be significantly affected. This is a pretty tough technique. Do not continue it for more than the specified period, otherwise you can cause significant harm to the body.   nAs for the diet, the magical technique implies the presence of three meals, which should not be snacked between. Moreover, if you want to do everything according to the rules, breakfast, which consists only of unsweetened liquid, should be no later than 9 o'clock. Have lunch before 14:00, and you need to have dinner at a maximum of 18:00. After dinner, you need to forget about food until the next day and, if hunger occurs, suppress it only with unsweetened tea and water. You can, of course, and coffee. But at night it is better not to abuse this drink, otherwise, instead of the disappearance of the desire for a snack, you may encounter insomnia.   nSince this technique is practically carbohydrate-free, its developers do not call for sports. Moreover, it is recommended, during the period of following the rules of the magic diet, to abandon any activities that can take a lot of your strength from you. Low-calorie protein diets will not be easy to replenish. It is quite possible to limit yourself to a simple and short morning exercise or gymnastics. But getting enough sleep (sleeping at least 8 hours) and being in the fresh air for an hour or two a day is more than desirable. This will help the body recover faster and tolerate dietary rules more easily. Also, the developers of the diet advise to pamper yourself with water treatments, massage and fully relax. It is better to follow such a diet during vacation, when you can afford to lie on the couch more than usual and go for a relaxing procedure (or carry it out at home).   nTo save the obtained result and not harm the body, you need to get out of the magic diet smoothly and carefully. The basic rules for leaving the diet regimen include recommendations for the day. Previously prohibited foods should be added gradually.   nOn the first day after the seven-day diet, it is better not to introduce anything new at all. Just increase the amount of food allowed on the diet a little. For example, use a few boiled eggs for breakfast, for lunch - up to 300 g of stewed vegetables, and for dinner - fresh vegetable salad.   nInclude a little boiled meat or lean fish (as an option, your favorite seafood) in the diet of the second day.   nOn the third day after the magic diet, add some cereals or durum wheat pasta to the menu. If you really want something sweet, allow yourself a little, but in the morning.   nNext, expand the range of vegetables and fruits. Eat whatever you want. Do this on days four to seven.   nAnd only after a week has passed, you can add other foods to the diet, not forgetting about proper nutrition and not overeating. Otherwise, with such an effort, the kilograms that have left you may say hello again. And now it will be very good (regardless of whether you were friends with sports during the diet or before it started) to help keep your weight normal with the help of physical activity and the study of problem areas. This will make you not only slim, but also contribute to the acquisition of an attractive, elastic body.

dietList.hintText: 10 days of a detox diet will effectively cleanse the gastrointestinal tract, have a positive effect on blood circulation and improve the health of the whole body.
dietList.introduction:
First, let's understand the origin of the word detox. It is an abbreviated form of the word detoxification (cleansing the body of toxins and decay products). Today detox programs are very popular, but experts warn that you need to follow them with extreme caution. It is important to understand that the body says goodbye not only to harmful substances, but also to useful minerals, vitamins, etc.
 Detox diets can help return the body to normal functioning of gluttons after the holidays, accompanied by an abundant feast with fatty and high-calorie foods, smokers and people who do not neglect the frequent use of alcoholic beverages, who are overweight.
dietList.menuText:
Experts determine the most optimal time for these detox programs. According to doctors, it is at the beginning of spring or autumn that the body most willingly says goodbye to excess. This also applies to weight and substances that interfere with the body's normal functioning. adhere to detox food during vacation, or at least at a time when your lifestyle is calm and you are not subject to strong physical exertion.
 To detox food was really effective and not only took a couple of kilograms with you, but also positively affected health, you need to prepare for such a cleansing of the body in advance. The recommended time for preparation is at least one month. During this period, it is necessary to limit the presence of fatty foods, fried and too salty products in the diet. You also need to exclude high-calorie sweets, flour products as much as possible. coffee and alcoholic drinks. Eat in the evenings no later than 19-20 hours. But if you adhere to the rule of le 18 hours, of course, you should not retreat from it. Waking up in the morning, it is recommended to drink a glass of water with freshly squeezed lemon juice on an empty stomach (the water should be warm). And 10 days before the start of the detox diet, you need to completely switch to eating only plant foods, allowing yourself only one or two times during this time to eat low-fat cheese or a dish of meat / fish.

Also one of the undoubted advantages of the grapefruit diet is that you can lose weight and improve your health on it.
It contains vitamin C, which is a powerful natural antioxidant that fights harmful free radicals.

Tocopherol is a powerful antioxidant found in grapefruit. It is involved in controlling the work of the body's endocrine system, heart, blood vessels and nervous system, increasing stress resistance and nullifying unreasonable mood swings.
The dietary fiber found in this citrus reduces the risk of stomach wasting during diet and helps to tune the proper functioning of the gastrointestinal tract.
cons: It is not uncommon for people on a grapefruit weekly diet to notice a feeling of hunger after breakfast or lunch, which, as you have noticed, is much more scarce than dinner. This diet takes some getting used to.

Some people say that switching to this diet causes stomach upset or provokes skin rashes. Any such manifestations are a clear indicator that this diet is not suitable for you. In this case, be sure to stop using grapefruit and see a doctor.

Since the diet is quite low in calories, you may encounter weakness, causeless irritability, and mood swings. Still, in order to withstand such a diet, you need to have a certain willpower, especially if you have not previously been on diets and are not used to food restrictions.

Banning food in the evenings can be a problem for working people who only return home by the time they can no longer eat. If you want to lose weight on this particular diet, you may have to rebuild your schedule.

The disadvantages include additional financial costs for the main product of the diet. Grapefruit does not belong to the most budgetary food products, and some people are confused by this fact when choosing a diet.

dietList.hintText: In order not only not to gain the lost pounds after a diet, but also to prevent malfunctions in the work of internal organs (which is also possible), it is extremely important to complete the diet methodology correctly. So, at least in the first 3 days after the end of the diet do not eat any fatty foods and spicy foods. Still daily (at least the first week) drink half a glass of grapefruit juice to help the body adapt to the new diet and not be intimidated by a change in diet.
dietList.introduction: The ability of grapefruit to help in weight loss in the course of research was proved, in particular, by the American doctor Ken Fujioka. The specialist conducted an experiment with the participation of 100 men and women overweight in various degrees of manifestation. The volunteers had to drink grapefruit juice and eat in half The scientist's experiment lasted exactly 12 days, after which it was recorded that all the participants lost some excess weight. Average plumb weights - 2-3 kilograms. It is noteworthy that at the same time people did not change their habits and ate in the usual way Doctors recorded a pleasant bonus in the form of a decrease in insulin levels in the participants' blood.Imagine what results can be achieved with the help of grapefruit, if at the same time you introduce reasonable changes in your diet and turn it towards the correct moderate-calorie diet.   nWorth noting that the bitter peculiar taste of this fruit may not be to everyone's liking. There are some tricks that will increase the chances of loving grapefruit, even for those who were previously skeptical about its use. The main part of the bitterness is concentrated precisely in the partitions of the fruit. Try to simply eat grapefruit without them (for example, with a special spoon with sharp edges, which will help you choose the pulp in the most convenient way). When purchasing grapefruit, make sure that it is not too soft. If, when you press your finger, a dent forms on the citrus, then it is overripe. You do not need to buy such a fruit. It is not recommended to purchase a very hard grapefruit, since, on the contrary, it has not yet ripened. It should be of medium hardness - firm, but not soft.
dietList.menuText: Be prepared to exclude sugar, salt, any spices, sauces, fatty meat products, fatty fish (herring, mackerel and their counterparts), flour products, corn in any form, white vegetables, carbonated and alcoholic drinks, milk and sour milk of high fat content.   nAccording to the rules of this diet, you need to eat strictly three times a day, avoiding snacks between meals. It is not recommended to eat after 7 pm. You need to go to bed with a slight feeling of hunger. do not have dinner on time, you will have to refuse dinner. So try not to practice this behavior if you do not want to go to bed hungry.   nThe basis of the diet is grapefruit and its juice. Citrus is recommended to be eaten at the beginning of a meal. So it stimulates the process of losing weight more actively , and it brings much more benefits to the body than if it were eaten for dessert.There are also such dietary products as lean fish (a good choice would be tuna), lean meat oh, low-fat dairy and fermented milk products, canned fish without oil in their own juice, non-starchy vegetables. Of course, it is recommended to drink pure water from liquids. Unsweetened tea (preferably green brewed) and coffee (no more than one cup per day) are allowed. You can add a little natural honey to these drinks. See the diet menu for more detailed advice.

dietList.introduction: This nutrition system does not prescribe a clear time frame. You can eat this way for quite a long time. The diet of a fitness diet is close to correct and balanced. You can occasionally allow yourself deviations without going into food binges, otherwise the results from even the most strong training will take a very long time.
dietList.menuText: So, what to eat on a fitness diet? This technique has two main food heroes - proteins and carbohydrates you know.   nCarbohydrates (scientifically - carbohydrates) are necessary in order to provide the body with energy, to nourish it is the brain and nervous system, which is important.In our body, carbohydrates are stored in the liver and muscles and are consumed intensively during exercise and other physical activity.If you notice during sports that the body asks to lie down when you are actively swinging your legs, it is likely that that in this way it is the lack of the right carbohydrates that makes itself felt, which the muscles signal about.   nWhen we talk about the right carbohydrates, we mean carbohydrate-containing products that are absorbed for a long time. These include, in particular, cereals, whole grains, fruits, vegetables and berries (preferably non-starchy and having a low glycemic index). The body's processing of these products provides a gradual release of energy, and it becomes easier for you and exercise more productively.   nBut fast carbohydrates, which are found in high-calorie sweets and soft flour products, are not helpers in this matter. Leaving their abundance in your diet, you run the risk of not only significantly delaying the results of fitness training, but also gaining excess weight. Do you want this outcome? Then strictly control the flow of this type of product. Better yet, give it up altogether, allowing it as a rare exception.   nProteins are also an essential component of a fitness diet. They are a kind of building blocks for building beautiful and correct muscles. Proteins of various types help to restore and build beautiful muscle relief. If you completely deprive the body of proteins, it will simply begin to eat muscles, and then you can definitely forget about attractive forms. And by continuing this lifestyle for a long time, you can even earn muscle dystrophy. While exercising, and in general leading a healthy lifestyle, be sure to introduce low-fat dairy and sour-milk products, meat, fish, seafood, eggs and other healthy proteins into your diet.   nIt is impossible to ignore, speaking of a fitness diet, and fats. Yes, compared to proteins and carbohydrates, there is less fat in such a diet. But to completely abandon them, no matter how strongly and quickly you want to build, is definitely not worth it. Healthy fats contained in vegetable oils, nuts, on the contrary, can contribute to even faster weight loss and achievement of results, while maintaining the proper functioning of the body. But do not use them just before the planned workout. Of course, you need to consume them in moderation, since these foods also contain quite a few calories.   nOf course, you should never forget about water. This liquid in a fitness diet, especially at the stage of active weight loss, is just like air. Water promotes the elimination of breakdown products of proteins and fats, drives out toxins and other harmful substances from the body that can harm it. Also, water supplies muscles with oxygen, relieves muscle pain as much as possible, makes soreness after training less noticeable and helps to quickly find the desired chiseled body. If you feel lethargic, depressed, or severely dry in your mouth, think about how much fluid you are drinking. In the case when your answer is far from the recommended rate (at least one and a half liters per day), the root of the problem is obvious. Be sure to drink water, both before and after sports, and directly during physical activity.

dietList.introduction:
How does this technique work? Its main characteristics are that the amount of carbohydrate-containing foods is significantly reduced in the diet, and lean protein becomes a source of energy. The fact is that the body spends a lot of energy on its breakdown (more than in the product contains calories), in connection with which fat is broken down and a person loses weight.
 The second participants in the diet menu are fruits and vegetables, which help to provide the body with fiber and essential vitamins that help make the process of losing weight more comfortable without an acute feeling of hunger. they fill the stomach and create a feeling of fullness, when in reality you, as a rule, consume very few calories.
 The distinctive feature of this diet is that it is great for even people who have a normal body weight or are completely slim, but have local deposits of fat, from which one so wants to get rid of. indexer. What matters is how the body looks (the ratio of fat and muscle components). On this diet, just from the fatty tissue, you can get rid of, transforming it into muscle. To make the muscle skeleton more attractive, do not forget about physical activity, especially since there will probably be enough strength for sports, because the diet-ration is quite complete.
dietList.menuText:
So, if you decide to lose weight on a fat-burning diet, be prepared for the fact that the menu will consist of proteins, slow-acting carbohydrates and fiber. It is recommended to take four meals a day, at approximately equal intervals of time (ideally between them should take about 4 hours), excluding meals 3 hours before bedtime.
 We draw attention to the above ingredients and their important role in the process of losing weight and transforming the body. Protein is so important, because it is from it that our muscles are largely composed, as well It is an essential raw material for building cells. Protein speeds up metabolism, helps reduce cravings for sweets, provides the body with sufficient energy, helps to better absorb vitamins and other nutrients that enter the body, and ensures satiety for a long enough period.
 Fiber helps to improve digestion and removes toxins from the body.In this diet, it is especially important, as it will help to remove waste products that form when consuming protein, which is included in the diet in large quantities. Vegetables and fruits are an excellent side dish for protein-containing foods.
 The course of the most important biochemical processes in the body is influenced, of course, by water. Be sure to drink at least one and a half liters of liquid daily. This requirement is especially relevant in the summer season and during training. Otherwise, a lack of water can worsen your well-being and slow down your metabolism, which in no way contributes to more productive weight loss. On a fat-burning diet, it is ideal to drink 2-2.5 liters of clean, non-carbonated liquid every day. Firstly, it will help to start the process of losing weight sooner. Secondly, it will contribute to the removal of breakdown products of protein products, which is also very important for maintaining health. In addition to water, from drinks, not counting liquid fermented milk products, it is better to allow yourself only green tea. Black tea and coffee are available occasionally if you really want to.

dietList.introduction: The principles of the atomic diet have many similarities with the nutritional rules promoted by the famous nutritionist Pierre Ducan, as well as with the Swiss weight loss system. The diet is based on the alternation of days. One day is protein, the next is rich in products with the right carbohydrates.   nWhy This method works? As you know, carbohydrates are a kind of fuel for the body, giving us energy. On days when only protein products are supplied, energy becomes insufficient, and the body is forced to expend its own fat reserves. This pushes a stalled metabolism to burn excess calories and , as a result, leads to weight loss. And a carbohydrate day also does not give weight gain, but subject to moderation in the diet. The number of calories received should not be greater than the energy that the body uses.   nAs for the volume of food, they are not clearly regulated Eat until you feel full, but remember that this feeling comes after 20 minutes. chickpeas after starting a meal, so do not rush to pounce on food and swallow it quickly. Try to use it in a calm and measured environment, without being distracted by extraneous things such as watching TV and talking on the phone.   n Do not starve. The body will think that times are lean and, on the contrary, will start stocking up on the fat you want to get rid of.   nDo not take too long pauses between meals. The usefulness and effectiveness of fractional nutrition for weight loss has not been canceled. Try to have at least three meals a day. If there is an easy snack between them - great!
dietList.menuText: Of course, a diet cannot do without rules. So, in the first week of atomic life there are two unshakable principles.   nThe first is the absence of any food, at least 3 hours before bedtime.   The second requirement is from the diet on any days you need to exclude potatoes and products containing flour and sugar in any form. It is undesirable to include bananas with grapes in the diet.   If you threw off an insufficient amount of kilograms in the first week, you can still live with these prohibitions. If you really want to taste the forbidden fruit, allow yourself a little. For example, eat 20 grams of your favorite chocolate, but not a whole bar. This also applies to the period when your weight is already close to ideal. After losing weight, just stick to the principles of alternating days.   nList of recommended foods for protein days:   ndairy and dairy products of low fat or low fat (kefir, fermented baked milk, milk, cheese, cottage cheese, yogurt, natural yogurt);    low-fat meat (be sure to remove the skin from it and veins);   Eggs (chicken and quail);   Low-fat fish and seafood.   On days when you should eat carbohydrate-containing products, the diet should consist of:   nany fruits (except grapes and bananas);   berries;   vegetable;   vegetable low-fat broth;   vegetable stew.   Drinks are allowed any, but without sugar. The priority is clean water without gas.
dietList.resultText: According to people who have tried the atomic method of losing weight, in the first week of such nutrition they managed to lose 5, 7 and even more kilograms

dietList.introduction: This diet was developed by a nutritionist from Germany Zeik. According to sources, it happened more than 70 years ago. At first, it was tried by visitors to an elite sanatorium in Switzerland, who were more than satisfied with the results. Later, the yogurt diet began to spread among ordinary people. and has successfully reached our time.   nIf you decide to try this diet, do not rush to the store for yoghurts. It is definitely worth giving up various fruit types of this product, as they usually contain sugar, which is prohibited by this technique. And other additives are unlikely to benefit the body either. As a last resort, buy an empty low-fat or low-fat product and be careful not to contain sugar.   nBut the best way out of the situation is to make yogurt yourself. Here is its recipe. you need pasteurized milk in an amount of 1-3 liters (depending on how many products you want to cook at a time) and dry yoghurt culture ra (available at many pharmacies). Pour this milk into a sterilized container, boil, cool to about 40 degrees. Now mix a little milk with the yoghurt culture and add the mixture to the main amount of liquid.   nIt is recommended to infuse homemade yoghurt in a yogurt maker or in a thermos. Before placing the liquid in it, the thermos should be doused with boiling water and wiped thoroughly. Having tightly closed the temporary habitat of the future yogurt, you need to let it brew for 12 to 14 hours. Note that the longer the yogurt costs, the more sour it turns out. Now this mixture needs to be sent to the refrigerator so that it will stand there for a couple of hours and thicken.
dietList.menuText: To add spice to yoghurt, if you are going to season a vegetable or meat salad, dilute it a little with lemon juice or soy sauce. In general, there are a lot of options for its use. Use your imagination. It is worth giving up salt during the period of weight loss. And from liquids , in addition to yoghurt, you should give preference to unsweetened green tea, clean water. Occasionally you can afford a cup of coffee, but also without any additives.   nLonger yoghurt diet lasts one week. You can include up to 500 g of yogurt, 400 g in the daily diet. non-starchy fruits and vegetables, 150 g of lean meat or fish / seafood, 2 glasses of freshly squeezed juice, herbs, green and herbal teas and decoctions. Last meal is recommended 3-4 hours before bedtime.

dietList.menuText: During the above time, the diet contains mainly zucchini of various heat treatments. The zucchini menu is supplemented with low-fat fish and meat, cottage cheese, yogurt and other dairy and sour-milk products with a low percentage of fat, eggs, mushrooms.   nUnder bakery products, pasta, potatoes, various smoked products, sugar, pickles, fats and fatty foods, alcoholic beverages are prohibited. You can add a little vegetable oil during heat treatment (for example, when stewing vegetables), but try not to do this often. If the food goes well without salt - great.   nAs for drinking, the emphasis should be on clean water in a volume of at least 1.5 liters per day. You can also indulge in various types of teas without sugar It is better to prefer green tea more often. Vegetable juices are also acceptable, but freshly squeezed (of which you are sure) and not very concentrated. But from coffee, even empty Oh, during the period of zucchini weight loss, it is strongly recommended to refuse.   nFor this diet, it is best to use young zucchini. The priority is zucchini (but this is not a fundamental requirement). If you like raw zucchini, you can also eat them during your diet. But in this form, you can only afford very young and freshly picked vegetables, the quality of which you have no doubt about.   nThere is no need to torment vegetables for a long time with heat treatment. It is advisable to choose a cooking method that is not very long and as gentle as possible.   nOn a zucchini diet, it is recommended to adhere to fractional nutrition and eat five times at regular intervals. Make sure to have dinner at least 3 hours before falling asleep.   nAs for serving size, try not to overeat. When you get up from the table, you should feel a slight sensation of hunger. There is no need to be afraid to stay hungry, because in a few hours you will be able to eat again.   nIf you want the result to be more noticeable, you can adjust it with physical activity. dietList.introduction: This four-day diet gained wide popularity with the light hand of actress Victoria Ruffo, who became famous after her role in the TV series Just Maria. Victoria is from Mexico. Such diet courses helped her regain an attractive body after giving birth.   nMechanism of action. The Mexican diet is based on a noticeable cut in calories and a fairly strict diet, as well as on limiting the portions of allowed dishes and products.   nThe menu contains eggs, milk, cheese. Complex carbohydrates are represented by fruits and vegetables. Fats in this method are practically absent, at all a small amount of these components comes from the use of dairy products.   nThe Mexican diet is quite strict. It implies strict adherence to the menu below. You cannot change breakfast / lunch / dinner places, this may negatively affect the results of weight loss. Also, do not exclude any dishes or products from the diet, their set is already significantly reduced.
dietList.menuText: On a diet we eat three times a day - breakfast, lunch, dinner. Snacks are excluded. Dinner is recommended at least 3 hours before bedtime. If you can have dinner earlier and then fall asleep without severe hunger pangs, do so. From drinks , in addition to ordinary water, drink green tea without sugar (sometimes black is possible), in which you can add a slice of fresh lemon. It is not necessary to give up empty coffee at all, but do not abuse this drink. And it is better to allow yourself only in the morning and in natural custard.   nIt is also important to note that at least five hours should pass between meals. Consider this fact when planning your diet on the Mexican diet.

dietList.menuText: A 12-day acting diet means eating blocks, each of which lasts 3 days. An indicative point of the acting diet is the restriction on fluid intake. It is recommended to drink ordinary water in an amount of no more than 500 ml per day. And in the so-called wine day it is worth abandoning it altogether. Therefore, it is worth recognizing that weight loss is largely due to the loss of fluid in the body. This rule, if you want to clearly sit on the acting method of losing weight, it is still better to adhere to only the 4-day version. it is worth allowing yourself to drink at least a liter of water a day. After all, your goal is to lose weight, and not to injure the body. We recommend that you approach dietary rules reasonably and with a grain of salt.

dietList.hintText: To achieve the maximum effect on the angel diet, it is recommended not to forget about physical activity. Experts advise to visit the gym and fully pump problem areas. In extreme cases, charging at home is also suitable.
dietList.introduction: The peculiarities of angelic weight loss include the fact that it occurs due to the control of portions and the predominance of protein products in the diet. The intake of protein into the body with a rigid cut in carbohydrate-containing products allows you to actively burn fat reserves. At the same time, the elasticity and firmness of the muscles are preserved, which very important for models.
dietList.menuText:
During the angel diet course, sugar (sweeteners are not desirable), salt, alcoholic beverages are prohibited. From the products, preference should be given to meat and herbs, green vegetables. And it is desirable that the vegetable portion is always larger than the meat portion.
 If it is not possible to eat the green lettuce recommended by this diet, it is quite possible to replace it with celery, spinach, fresh cucumbers or cabbage. These foods also contain a minimum of calories, but at the same time are rich in fiber, which helps improve digestion and helps to lose weight quickly and comfortable.
 Salads are recommended to be seasoned with freshly squeezed lemon juice, but sometimes you can also use vegetable oil, which is not worth giving up at all. But the priority is still the healthier one - olive oil. Coffee, if you are not a fan of it, or it is contraindicated for you, can be replaced with tea (preferably high-quality green). Be sure to try to drink at least 1.5-2 liters of ordinary water daily s (or non-carbonated mineral). It is advisable to boil, bake or subject the meat to another method of thermal processing, which helps to preserve the maximum useful properties and does not add more calories. From time to time, so that the same type of food does not get bored, the meat can be fried using a small amount of vegetable oil. It is also allowed to replace meat with lean types of fish, but do not roll the fish in flour or breadcrumbs and do not use fatty sauces. Carrots and tomatoes on the menu can be used interchangeably.
dietList.resultText: Weight loss up to 8 kg in 13 days

dietList.introduction: Let's take a closer look at the mechanisms of action of all types of diets based on coffee. Coffee is a diuretic. So, one of the principles of action based on methods is to remove excess fluid from the body. Coffee also helps to speed up metabolism and provoke more active burning calories, which contributes to successful and rapid weight loss.Even special studies have been carried out, the results of which have proven that drinking coffee in the morning helps to burn calories more actively until the evening.   nIt is worth noting that coffee helps to reduce appetite. up to three cups of this drink daily (and this is exactly the rate of its consumption for those who have no contraindications) should be introduced into the diet of people prone to overeating.Start the day with a fragrant cup of this drink.And it is quite possible that you lose a couple of extra pounds you will succeed without diets, as your appetite will decrease significantly.

By the way, it is not recommended to eat for such a period before bedtime.   nIn all diet options, you should reduce the amount of salt in the diet as much as possible.

dietList.introduction: The mechanism of action of the honey diet is built on the effect on our body of exactly the right carbohydrates. They are gratefully absorbed by the body and not only do not provoke the formation of new kilograms, but also help to get rid of excess ones. Good carbohydrates help start the mechanism of splitting subcutaneous fat. fat, not wanting to part with us, holds on so tightly and prevents us from losing weight.   nHoney, which is the favorite of this technique, is a natural product of a dietary nature. According to statistics, replacing sugar with honey, with a considerable initial amount of extra pounds, you can lose up to 10 kg which is a very impressive indicator. Moreover, most types of honey are much healthier than sugar. Try replacing the sweet white harmfulness with it, and you probably won't want to return to your old habits in the future.   nThe main secret of weight loss lies in the extensive composition of honey. helps to normalize the functioning of the pancreas. the efficiency of gastric lipase, which stores fat cells for our body. Honey, on the other hand, expels these structures, preventing them from settling and thereby provoking the appearance of excess weight.   nIt is known that honey is a product produced by the glorious toilers bees. These industrious insects process pollen to produce a wonder product. The pollen contains phytosterols, which, like armor, protect blood cells from cholesterol trying to get into them. A decrease in this indicator increases the likelihood of effective weight loss up to 40%.
dietList.menuText: The main rules of a diet based on honey consumption include avoiding foods that contain starch. They can significantly slow down the process of losing weight. It is also important that honey, reacting with starch-containing products, loses many beneficial properties, as well as dietary opportunities.   nAnd when honey is friends with milk and sour milk, it is correctly and fully absorbed by the body, helps it to function and transforms our figure. As you might guess, these products are present in the honey diet without fail.   nMore one important condition for effective weight loss is replenishing the diet with fruit and vegetable products (but not starchy in nature). They contain a lot of fiber, which is necessary for the proper functioning of gastrointestinal motility. A carotene and vitamins of group A (which fruits and vegetables are not deprived of) in a company with honey contribute even more efficient burning of fat cells.   nThe six-day honey diet provides three tr traditional food intake. Their time is not strictly regulated. But it is recommended to take a morning meal within the first hour after waking up in order to wake up the body and start metabolic processes in it after a night's rest. Dinner is worth at least three hours before bedtime. If you are used to not eating after 18-19 hours, even in your free time from the diet, you should not deviate from this rule.   nFrom drinking, of course, clean water without gas is a priority. Coffee and tea, if desired, are acceptable, but empty. If it's really hard to drink unsweetened drinks, you can occasionally add a little honey. Sugar is the enemy of your weight loss.

dietList.hintText: There is one more reason that can cause a feeling of false hunger. When you eat sweets in the body, there is a sharp jump in glucose. But just as quickly after that, if you do not eat sweets, the glucose level drops sharply. you are drawn to the fridge. It is much easier to overeat in this state than if you were just hungry, without communicating with sweets before.
dietList.introduction: Note that the love of sweets in true sweet tooths is similar to alcohol or drug addiction. Of course, the first does not cause such social condemnation as the other two. But for sweet lovers it is often as difficult to give up sweets as people suffering from alcoholism and drug addiction , from their addictions.   nIn addition to an unattractive figure, craving for sweets often provokes a lot of other troubles. , skin problems.   nAlso, excessive consumption of sweets can lead to emotional instability, increased nervousness, aggressiveness, muscle fatigue, anemia, decreased quality of vision. A direct link has been established between the excessive presence of sugar in the diet and impairment of the cardiovascular system. Sugar can cause a lack of thiamine, and a decrease in the amount Twa of this substance leads to dystrophy of the heart muscle and a host of health complications. And extravascular fluid accumulation, which is also triggered by overweight sugar, can even lead to cardiac arrest! And these are just the main problems.   n Often the reason that people cannot give up sugar is that this white product makes you feel false hunger. The man, it would seem, has just eaten something sweet, and quite high-calorie, and he wants to have a snack again. As scientists have found, when sugar is consumed in the brain, free radicals are released that interfere with the normal functioning of brain cells and provoke hunger when in reality you are full. So they deceive the body.
dietList.menuText: Honey and fruits, which form the basis of this diet, will help to calm down the cravings for sweets. On one of the days, you are allowed to indulge yourself with ice cream.   n Meals are three times a day, the time intervals between breakfast, lunch and dinner are about the same. try not to eat at least three hours before bedtime. Snacks on a sweet diet are not desirable. If it is difficult to survive the time before meals, try to kill the hunger with tea slightly sweetened with honey. This usually works. Any fruit is allowed. But it is better to stop your choice more often on apples, citrus fruits, and not on starchy fruits such as bananas. From vegetables you can do everything except potatoes. It is also not recommended to lean on legumes. Salt vegetable salads is allowed, but a little. If you can for a short diet, completely abandon salty foods - very good To add flavor to the salad, as well as to tea, you can add a little freshly squeezed lemon juice.   nBy the way, high-calorie and harmful sweets should be replaced with more healthy and low in calories. Introduce more fruits, dried fruits (in particular, raisins, prunes, dates) into the diet. Jam (ideally without sugar) or honey can serve as a substitute for sugar in tea and other hot drinks.   nOf the purchased sweets, marmalade and marshmallows are the lowest in calories and are more useful. You can also keep some dark chocolate in your diet. The rest of the sweet products will certainly not bring anything useful to your health or your figure. If you want something from the forbidden products, it is not necessary to delete them from your life completely and irrevocably. This is fraught with stress and, as a result, a breakdown, because of which you can put on even more extra pounds.

dietList.introduction: The duration of the stage is individual. According to the reviews of those losing weight, you have to spend a lot of time on Fastening. But the presence of new and such familiar products, the ability to move away from the diet a little eliminate the psychological discomfort of the stage. The duration is calculated by the formula - 10 days for each lost kilogram in the second stage. That is, if you lost 8 kilograms on the Alternation, you will have to spend 80 days in the Fixation phase.
dietList.menuText:
Here are a few things about the Fixing step.
 Add starchy foods. Your diet may gradually add foods that you have traditionally eaten before, such as regular bread, pasta and potatoes. But they should be consumed in moderation, not constantly.
 Increase the volume of bran. Raise the daily norm to three tablespoons of this valuable component.
 Eating honey. A new element of the nutrition system that will brighten up the complete absence of sweets in the diet. Now you are allowed to eat up to three teaspoons of this healthy and tasty product.
 Setting up Holidays! The return of the usual diet, according to the author, is impossible without some indulgences to yourself. Holidays or feasts are meals during which you eat whatever you want. Absolutely any food in any quantity. remember that the feast is one meal, not the whole day. And you can repeat it only twice a week and not for two days in a row.
 Return Xia to Attack. This should be done once a week. You can choose any day you like and any menu from the first phase.

dietList.introduction:
This phase is where the main weight loss occurs. There is no fixed duration. In theory, you should stick to it until your weight is ideal.
 nHere are the basic principles of this phase.
 Add vegetables. To a purely protein diet, fiber-rich foods are added. These are vegetables and greens. In total, Dr. Ducan allows the addition of twenty-eight new foods, which makes the diet more balanced and varied.
 Alternating protein days with mixed ones. Protein days are periods when you continue to eat only animal proteins are used in food Mixed - when vegetable proteins are added to protein foods Alternation patterns are selected individually To determine your alternation scheme, use the following: Up to ten kg excess weight - 1 (protein-vegetable day) / 1 (pure protein days). twenty kg - 3/3. Up to 30 and more kg - 5/5.
dietList.resultText: During the Alternation phase, weight loss is stable, but not intense. The average is one kilogram per week. Therefore, you will need to diet in this phase from several weeks to several months.

dietList.introduction:
This phase is where the main weight loss occurs. There is no fixed duration. In theory, you should stick to it until your weight is ideal.
 Here are the basic principles of this phase.
 Add vegetables. To a purely protein diet, fiber-rich foods are added. These are vegetables and greens. In total, Dr. Ducan allows the addition of twenty-eight new foods, which makes the diet more balanced and varied.
 Alternating protein days with mixed ones. Protein days are periods when you continue to eat only animal proteins are used in food Mixed - when vegetable proteins are added to protein foods Alternation patterns are selected individually To determine your alternation scheme, use the following: Up to ten kg excess weight - 1 (protein-vegetable day) / 1 (pure protein days). twenty kg - 3/3. Up to 30 and more kg - 5/5.
dietList.resultText: During the Alternation phase, weight loss is stable, but not intense. The average is one kilogram per week. Therefore, you will need to diet in this phase from several weeks to several months.

benefits: There are no strict restrictions in it. You eat quite a variety. The body receives a lot of nutrients and does not starve. Also, to the undoubted advantages of the diet, it is worth adding the beneficial properties of the green tea itself.

Green tea is an excellent natural biostimulant. It saturates the body with energy, helps to improve mood and invigorates. Despite dietary nutrition, you will be able to fully exercise and not experience a breakdown.

Also, this drink has a positive effect on the body's immune system, making it stronger. Green tea is especially indicated in cold seasons, when viruses roam the streets. It is a great way to fight off diseases.

Green tea is known for its antibacterial properties, and it also has an antifungal effect. Therefore, it is recommended to use it in the early stages of diseases such as herpes, salmonella, candidiasis, etc.
Far from being in the last place among the beneficial properties and its anticancer effect
Green tea also removes harmful heavy metals from the body.
cons: Green tea has a strong diuretic effect. It is possible that you will become a frequent visitor to the toilet, especially in the early days of the diet marathon, if you previously drank much less tea.
If you have been seriously fond of this drink before, then it is better to choose another option for transforming your figure.
Not everyone likes green tea. Some people call it unpleasant and herb-like. If drinking it can be like torture for you, it is worth looking for another diet.

The main requirements of this diet include the use of green tea. You need to drink 1-1.5 liters of this miraculous drink per day. Please note that there is absolutely no sugar and other sweeteners in tea,
dietList.menuText: This system does not do without dietary restrictions regarding the choice of food. Any fatty, sweet, flour products should be temporarily excluded from the diet. If it is extremely difficult for you to say no to these products, then at least reduce their consumption and eat to 14 o'clock in the afternoon.   nBut the emphasis in the diet should be done on vegetables, fruits, eggs, low-fat meat and dairy products, fish. Cravings for sweets are good at muffling dried fruits, honey in small doses and homemade natural yogurt. buy in the store, be sure to monitor its composition. This product should not contain sugar and heavy cream. From time to time, it is allowed to introduce buckwheat and rice into the diet from cereals.   nIt cannot be said that salt is completely prohibited. But adding it to dishes you need as little as possible so as not to hinder the process of losing weight due to fluid retention in the body.   nAs for the portions of food, make them so that you do not feel hungry but. You can reduce the usual portions a little. But, if you cut them down a lot, you run the risk of getting a directly proportional result. The body will simply start to work in the economy mode and will not want to give up the fat reserves, since the metabolism, instead of accelerating, can, on the contrary, slow down. Don't starve!

By the way, the popular milk-tea diet was borrowed from here. In India, tea is usually served with milk.   nIndian diet works so well and is easily tolerated by many for the reason that the foods it contains are a source of easily digestible and beneficial carbohydrates for our body. the process is more comfortable.
dietList.menuText: Rice, which is especially honored in this diet, also helps to quickly suppress appetite. This cereal quickly envelopes the walls of the stomach, and thus makes you feel like you have eaten already a full plate, when in fact you have eaten only a few tablespoons The main thing - do not rush, enjoy the food. Then the feeling of satiety will certainly not let you down. Do not forget about how rice is useful in general. This food product is a real treasure of substances that help the body to function normally. It is not for nothing that rice porridge so often are recommended by doctors for patients with stomach ulcers and other ailments of the gastrointestinal tract.With regard to weight loss, pay attention to such components that live in rice as iodine and selenium.That they just help the body so actively drive off fats and transform the body. rice substances are involved in the regulation of fat and carbohydrate metabolism, control hormonal balance, maintain normal high level of cholesterol in the blood, are responsible for brain performance, muscle tone and endurance, normal functioning of the stomach, good mood, natural rejuvenation of the body.

dietList.introduction: According to the Dutch system, which many residents of the Netherlands adhere to for body shaping, you just need to clean up your diet in general. You need to exclude frankly unhealthy foods, give up snacks (when, in fact, you are not hungry) and make portions moderate. Its developers advise to follow this diet for 7 days. As a rule, this week takes 5-6 kg of unnecessary fat ballast.
dietList.menuText: The basic principles of the Dutch diet are as follows.   nThe first meal should be mostly healthy carbohydrates, lunch should be light, and dinner should be hearty, but moderate in calories. It is recommended to divide the daily food ration into 5 fractions.    It is advisable to have dinner around 6 pm If you go to bed quite late (by midnight, or even later), you can slightly shift the time of the last meal. But it is not recommended that dinner be later than 7 pm - 8 pm. Move back the dinner time little by little. Over time you will probably get used to it. You can easily have a snack before bed, but at least an hour or two before your night's rest.
dietList.resultText: Weight loss by 5 - 6 kg in 7 days

dietList.introduction: While losing weight on milk, you need to consume a drink made, as you might guess, from tea and milk. You can familiarize yourself with its recipe below. Follow a strict milk-tea diet, when the only dish is tea with milk, it is not recommended for more than three And just for the prevention of excess weight, one fasting day on this drink per week will be enough. It is carried out in the same way as a three-day diet - we use milk tea and that's all.   nIf you do not have iron willpower, and oh do not dream of losing weight instantly, you can turn to a diet in which milk tea is also an active assistant in losing weight, but it lasts longer (up to 10 days).   nIn fact, everything is simple. You significantly reduce the calorie content of the diet and, as a result, It is worth remembering that, in addition to the main drink of this system, do not forget about ordinary clean water.Drink it in the intervals between milk-tea meals in a volume of about 8 glasses per day.   nSince the calorie content of the diet on a dietary day is quite low, it is better to refuse to perform strong physical activity, and even more so from going to the gym. This can lead to a sharp decline in strength and a drop in blood pressure.
dietList.menuText: Here are some recipes for preparing this drink for weight loss. Note that it is best to use milk, maximum 2.5% fat (you can use low fat, but this can make you feel more hungry) and green tea. If with green tea, your relationship is completely sad and unbearable to drink it, you can take black (or mix these two types of tea).   nChoose one of the following methods at your discretion:    â€¢ Take milk heated to 70 degrees, add about 3- 4 teaspoons of tea leaves, infuse for 15-20 minutes.    â€¢ Brew tea and pour it into warm milk. If you don't like warm milk, you can also use cold, but the first option is the priority.    â€¢ Put a teaspoon of tea leaves into a cup , pour 100 ml of boiling water, add 100-150 g of milk.    â€¢ Recipe in English: pour 1/3 of milk into heated cups, add 2/3 of strong tea infusion.   Whatever recipe you use, you should use 1 -1.5 liters of milk and 3-4 teaspoons of tea (or one spoonful for each tea reception separately, if you like but a strong drink).

dietList.hintText: You are allowed to eat no more than 5 tablespoons of any solid or liquid food at a time.
dietList.introduction: It is known that overeating is a common cause of unpleasant excess weight - the most pressing dietary problem of the 21st century. This diet teaches you to eat right, or rather, not to overeat. It is a normal, measured diet that entails weight loss.   nUnder the self-explanatory name of 5 spoons means the volume of food in the amount of 5 tablespoons. You can measure it with teaspoons, but then you can already afford everything 15. You can measure the required amount of food by turning to a kitchen scale. But they are not always at hand. , and not everyone has it at home. Using spoons in this case will be much easier. You can calculate the portion of food without problems, being almost anywhere. No one will notice that you are dieting.   n You should eat every 3 (maximum, 4) hours. There is no limit on the number of meals per day. Start from your life and work schedule, and try not to eat at least 3-4 hours before bedtime.
dietList.menuText: The diet is based on the calculation of portion sizes, but there are no strict restrictions on the composition of the daily diet on such a diet. You can leave your favorite foods and dishes on the menu.   For example, have breakfast with pasta or pancakes, but do not forget to keep within 5 canteens spoons by the amount eaten at a time.   Try to avoid too high-calorie and unhealthy foods.Remember that excess salt attracts excess moisture, overuse of sweets causes skin problems and leads to the formation of edema, and preservatives and fats clearly slow down the process of losing weight.   To diet 5 spoons was productive, you need to get used to limiting portions, trying to eat healthy food. Allow yourself high-calorie food 1-2 times a week in the morning, while leading an active lifestyle.   In the first week, pay particular attention to the purity of the diet. and portion sizes: your body is just beginning to adapt to a new nutritional system, and you need to help it cope with stress.
dietList.resultText: Weight loss up to 6 kg in 7 days

dietList.introduction: Salt is not just a flavoring agent, but an essential mineral that the body requires, for example for cellular regulation, body fluid regulation and blood pressure maintenance.   nSalt is found in most foods you eat every day. Foods such as vegetables, fruits and poultry contain less sodium than food of animal origin.   nThe maximum amount of sodium can be found in processed foods. Chips, frozen, fast food are loaded with an obscene dose of sodium to improve the taste.   nThe main principle low sodium diets - restricting high sodium foods and beverages or avoiding salt altogether This meal plan is usually recommended for treating high blood pressure or heart disease. salt per day.
dietList.menuText: How to make food tastier without salt? It's very simple - follow a few rules when preparing dishes.   First question: how to replace salt with a salt-free diet? Answer: use lemon juice as a substitute.   Prepare dishes with fresh herbs, not with dried bags.   Add new natural spices.   For a rich, savory salad dressing, use citrus juices and olive oil.   Add a mixture of garlic and ginger to soups.   Support fresh food for a delicious meal.   Excellent a quick snack - hummus made from dried chickpeas, seasoned with garlic and herbs.    For meat, you can make a special marinade with olive oil, garlic, vinegar, honey and ginger.
