dietList.introduction: This is a mono-diet, that is, only one product is allowed to be consumed. In this case, oatmeal. An important dietary rule is that it is forbidden to have dinner late. An evening meal should take place at least 4 hours before bedtime. During the day, you need to regularly drink clean water (not soda); the average rate is 2 liters. But the porridge itself cannot be washed down with water.   nOat flakes with additives, muesli, breakfast cereals and similar inventions are prohibited. Only pure, natural Do not add salt or sugar when consuming oatmeal. Herbal teas are the best choice for drinks.
dietList.menuText: To lose weight on this diet was as effective as possible, it is better to start with the purification stage. And rice will help you in this case. So, a week before oatmeal, if possible, it is worth talking to him (more precisely, to drink rice jelly It is prepared quite simply: 4 tablespoons of rice need to be poured into 1 liter of water, and leave to infuse overnight. In the morning, cook it on the weakest mode of your stove until you get jelly. Now cool this dish and drink After that, it is advisable not to eat for 4-5 hours. Then you can have a snack. Of course, it is desirable that the food was correct and healthy. But it is important not to have dinner later than 4 hours before the night's rest (as well as when observing the main oatmeal diet).   nAs for the next part of losing weight, this week will be spent on pure oatmeal. It is best to use fractional meals. This will reduce the chances of meeting hunger to a minimum. It is advisable to eat 200 grams of food every few hours, for example at 7 -00, 10-00, 13-00, 16-00 and 19-00.   nThe recipes for cooking porridge are simple. There are two of them.   nFirst: pour boiling water over the cereal overnight, in the morning it is ready to eat.   nSecond: boil the oatmeal until it thickens (up to 15 minutes - depending on the manufacturer), boiling water.
dietList.resultText: In seven days of life on this diet, you can get rid of 5 to 10 unnecessary kilograms. But, of course, you need to understand: if your excess weight is not large, then it will not fly off so quickly. Everything is individual.

review.text: Urrrah! The diet is over! The plumb line is 5,300. The weight after the diet is 57,400. For some reason, the plumb line is less this time than it was before, but it's not bad either. benefits: The undoubted advantage of the chocolate diet is getting quick results in a short time. The chocolate diet will help you quickly put yourself in order before a cruise or travel. You can also lose weight very quickly before a trip abroad.

The second plus of the chocolate diet will be appreciated by lovers of sweets - it is extremely difficult to resist a candy or a piece of chocolate, which, for example, the rice diet completely prohibits for 7 days.

Chocolate is one of the best brain stimulants - any student knows that during a session coffee and chocolate are irreplaceable things. This plus of the chocolate diet cannot be overestimated - you quickly lose weight, and at the same time, your mental activity does not suffer.

As a product not related to diet, chocolate is recommended for anemia and colds (increases the body's immunity). It should also be noted that chocolate (more precisely, in cocoa butter) contains powerful antioxidants that slow down the aging of the body.
cons: It does not normalize either the metabolism or the diet (the Montignac diet is much more preferable in this regard) - although the same can be attributed to some other fast diets
Of course, the staple chocolate diet is contraindicated in people with diabetes
The second contraindication is the presence of allergies (and the dependence of the allergy to chocolate on several factors and their combinations is possible).
You cannot use a diet if you have existing liver diseases, as well as if you have stones in the gallbladder or ducts (cholelithiasis).

dietList.introduction: The duration of the chocolate diet is seven days (tangible results of weight loss appear after three days of the diet - weight loss from 3 to 4 kg) - here it is necessary to take into account the loss of fluid in the body due to the rejection of salt.   nWeight loss at the end of the diet will be According to the chocolate diet, only 100 grams of chocolate is relied on for the whole day and nothing else.Some sources call the figure 80 grams and 90 grams - the first value in terms of calorie content will be very low value for the daily diet (440 Kcal) compared to others low-calorie diets - for example, an effective buckwheat diet has a calorie content of 970 Kcal, and 90 grams seems to be more convenient to divide into three meals, although almost any chocolate bar weighs 100 grams (for example, delicious Alpen Gold chocolate with raisins and nuts).   nEverything The daily allowance of chocolate for the chocolate diet can be eaten at a time, but it is preferable to divide it into 2-3 or more meals.   nWhite shock should be noted separately frit. Cocoa butter is almost completely absent. As a consequence, the classic chocolate diet cannot be carried out on white chocolate. Also, chocolate with sweeteners is not recommended (for diabetics).   nEach chocolate intake is accompanied by a cup of unsweetened coffee (it is possible with low-fat 1% milk). This requirement is common in all effective diets (the Japanese diet is an example). coffee speeds up metabolism by 1% to 4%, which leads to more intense weight loss (but also in large quantities affects the state of health not for the better).
dietList.menuText: The chocolate diet (like the popular watermelon diet) completely prohibits sugar and salt. As in most other diets, you should refrain from juices (including natural), soda and drinks (cause increased appetite - unlike the usual water) - the same recommendations are given by the medical diet used in all medical institutions.   nThe chocolate diet also excludes any vegetables and even more fruits.   nAlcohol in all forms is prohibited.   nImportant! Taking any liquid (water, green tea) is possible no earlier than 3 hours after taking chocolate and coffee. The minimum fluid intake should not be less than 1.2 liters (preferably more) - this requirement is typical for most fast diets that exclude salt.   nRepeated carrying out the same diet is possible not earlier than in a month or better more - it inflicts a significant blow on the body (although in some sources you can find an alternating weight loss regimen on a chocolate diet - after 7 days of a diet m the minimum interval before repeating is also 7 days).

Every day, a strawberry diet requires 4 cups strawberries (0.8 kg) Although strawberries are considered one of the most delicious berries, their sugar (carbohydrate) content is minimal compared to other berries (less only in cranberries and sea buckthorn) - why this diet is both effective and useful.

However, this diet does not apply to mono-diets, which involve the use of one particular product. This nutrition system is balanced by all the main indicators. It contains proteins (kefir, milk, cheese, cottage cheese, chicken, turkey, fish), and carbohydrates (berries, fruits, whole grain bread, oatmeal, potatoes). As for flour products and sugars, then they are completely excluded from the diet during this diet. The same applies to animal fats (taboo on cream, butter, lard, fatty meats and sausages)

dietList.introduction: The Hollywood diet got its name because of the well-established fashion for this diet among Hollywood celebrities, as well as the Dr. Atkins diet among astronauts and the Kremlin diet among prominent politicians. It is clear that the standards of movie stars primarily require visual appeal from actors, which is the case. And it is thanks to the Hollywood diet that many of the celebrities maintain their forms in accordance with the parameters of 90-60-90 for a long time. The second plus of the Hollywood diet is its easy implementation and adaptability to fast food.
dietList.menuText: Breakfast on all days of the diet should be excluded (in some less rigid variants of the Hollywood diet, breakfast may consist of a glass of green tea or a cup of coffee and half a grapefruit - according to the well-established, unsubstantiated opinion, this fruit dissolves cellulite). , confectionery, vegetables and fruits with a high starch content should be completely excluded during the entire diet. Alcohol and all alcohol-containing drinks and foods are prohibited during all days of the Hollywood diet. Sugar and all its derivatives should be completely excluded (you can add non-carbohydrate All food should be cooked without the use of fats and oils (only boiled or steamed). Like some other fast diets, such as the French diet, the Hollywood diet requires a complete rejection of salt and all kinds of pickles.

dietList.hintText: If you want to lose more pounds, you can use onion soup again in two to three weeks.
dietList.introduction: According to the rules of this diet, you need to eat a special soup for a week, the main ingredient of which is onion. You can supplement the diet with lean meat, fruits and vegetables. It is strictly contraindicated to use fatty foods, bread and other flour products, alcoholic and carbonated drinks in the menu. You can indulge in onion soup at any time if you feel hungry. Be sure to drink enough clean water, which can be accompanied by various types of teas and coffee without added sugar. On the first day of onion weight loss, in addition to soup, eat any fruit (preferably non-starchy) ; in the second - vegetables; in the third - fruits and any vegetables, except for potatoes, which are allowed in small quantities on the previous day.On the fourth day, eat the same way as on the third, but part of the diet can be replaced with one banana and a glass of skim milk or low fat. The fifth day of the onion technique implies the use of all previously allowed food s, but without the participation of fruits. But today you can eat a piece of chicken cooked without adding oil. Instead of chicken, you can afford some fish. On the sixth day, you can eat non-starchy vegetables and a little lean beef with the soup. The last day of the diet involves supplementing the soup diet with rice and vegetables. You can also have a couple of glasses of homemade fruit juice without sugar.
dietList.menuText: Below you can familiarize yourself with the most popular onion soup recipes and choose at your discretion (you can change the options). Onion soup with celery For its preparation, take white cabbage, 5-6 onions, a couple of tomatoes and green peppers, a little celery. Cook the mixture of vegetables until tender, and then add a little salt to taste. Onion soup with cabbage and carrots Take a dozen onions, cut into rings and fry in a pan (over low heat), adding a little vegetable oil. Now pour the onion water and add half a kilogram of white cabbage, one grated carrot, bay leaf, salt, pepper to taste.Onion soup with melted cheese Several onions cut into rings should be fried, as in the previous version, pour water and 100 milliliters of low-fat milk. Then add a little shabby processed cheese, which must first be melted in a water bath. The dish is ready. French soup Fry 2-3 onions in the form of rings over medium heat, salt, and add a little sugar, if desired. After these manipulations, the fire should be increased, add 1 tbsp to the pan. l. flour and, after waiting a little, pamper the dish with 100 ml of dry white wine and pour a little chicken low-fat broth. Boil the mixture, add a little more broth, boil for 10 minutes and season with salt to your liking. This soup is higher in calories than the previous ones, and therefore should not be overused. Allow yourself once or twice, but not more often, so that weight loss is as effective as possible.
dietList.resultText: The onion diet is quite effective, you can get rid of 5 kilograms in 1 week. But you should pay attention that the more you follow the diet, the better the result will be.

dietList.introduction: Like the chocolate diet and apple diet, the watermelon diet is a mono-food diet - which means that you must have a predisposition to this product in the diet and the absence of negative reactions of your body to watermelons. As well as the lemon-honey diet and cabbage diet, the watermelon diet is very a strict diet - which explains its short duration in its pure form.It should be noted that even if you are happy to eat watermelon in combination with other food, it is possible that on the second day of the watermelon diet painful sensations arise - then immediately stop this diet - watermelon has a strong diuretic effect and this has to be reckoned with - the first day or two, the main weight loss will occur due to the loss of excess water-salt deposits.
dietList.menuText: The main requirement of the menu is a limit on the number of watermelons eaten per day: 1 kilogram of watermelon per 10 kg of body weight (if your weight is 80 kilograms, then you can eat 8 kg of watermelon per day). dietList.menuText: Before each meal, you should drink 2 glasses of clean water. Food should be prepared using warming spices - pepper, turmeric, ginger, cinnamon, cardamom, etc. They speed up the metabolism. Energy drinks are allowed. These include hot chocolate, all types of teas, cocoa and coffee. Do not drastically reduce the calorie intake during a hearty diet, this can lead to constant hunger. Snacks should be healthy, ideally - protein type. According to nutritionist Leslie Bonci, it is protein that perfectly saturates and is digested for a long time, as a result of which a person does not experience hunger for a long time. The list of prohibited foods includes fast food, flour, sweets.

dietList.introduction: This is one of the fastest diets - its duration is only two days. Such a short period allows you to reduce the calorie content of the daily diet menu to a minimum. This will force the body to completely switch to internal reserves from accumulated fat deposits. It should be noted that, like everything else, short-term diets (for example, a summer diet), the results of the lemon-honey diet will only partially reflect the loss of fatty tissues - along the way, excess fluid will be excreted from the body - to prevent this effect, the menu of the lemon-honey diet includes a deliberately excessive amount of fluid.
dietList.menuText: The menu of the lemon-honey diet provides for a complete rejection of food throughout the day and its replacement with liquid with high acidity. To prepare it, you need to mix 3 liters of non-mineralized and still water, freshly squeezed juice from 15 lemons, 50 grams of honey. More nothing in the menu of the lemon-honey diet is not included.The energy value of the lemon-honey mixture is practically zero - weight loss is quite fast.A large percentage of citric acid in the mixture reduces the feeling of hunger, while glucose and sucrose of honey, in the absence of fats and proteins, provides an intensive decrease weight due to the body's fat reserves. In addition, in addition to the prepared lemon-honey mixture, you can drink ordinary non-mineralized and non-carbonated water or green tea without restrictions.

The first day is the most difficult, severe attacks of hunger are relieved by a large amount of drinking water. Throughout the diet, you need to drink at least 1.5 liters per day. Porridge can be made with milk, but only skimmed. With severe attacks of hunger, if they are not relieved by a glass of water, you can drink fermented milk products or fruit juices.

dietList.introduction: During the keto diet, the body receives enough calories and the person does not feel hungry, but the excess weight is lost due to the phenomenon of ketosis, which will be discussed. According to nutritionists, the diet has proven to be effective, and the result is stable due to the absence of stress sharp transition from a hunger strike to a regular diet. The menu for a week and recommendations will help you to properly follow the diet. Initially, the keto diet appeared to treat some diseases, but then found its place in dietetics. The principle of the diet is as follows: the body is the main fuel for the brain uses carbohydrates. With a sharp reduction in carbohydrates in the diet below 20 grams per day, the amount of glucose is critically reduced - and there is not enough energy for normal functioning and oxidation of fats. To nourish the brain, the body starts the process of obtaining alternative energy - ketosis. This is the process of breaking down fat located in body, which results in the formation of ketone bodies used in quality eats of alternative energy.
dietList.menuText: Carbohydrates are completely excluded from food. This means that nothing sweet, cereals, fruits, baked goods, starchy or sweet vegetables (such as beets, carrots, potatoes) are allowed. You can only green vegetables, but also when taking them the amount of carbohydrates in food should not exceed 20-50 grams per day.If you sometimes break down and eat a little carbohydrates, sharp jumps in blood sugar will continue and there will be no smooth transition of the body to alternative energy and the start of the ketosis process, since the body will still wait usual carbohydrates.
dietList.resultText: The elimination of carbohydrates from the diet does not allow the body to use substances as usual: fats are stored in reserve , and carbohydrates are used as the main energy. Thus, the body switches to using energy from fats, starting the process of ketosis. and helps to avoid breakdowns. There is no severe hunger, since there are no sharp jumps in blood sugar. The main advantage of such a diet is that the lost weight will not return, since there is no sharp change in diet and artificial reduction of calories. However, due to the large amount of proteins and fats. in the diet, a little kilograms per week go away.

dietList.hintText: Cucumbers are mostly eaten fresh, but they can also be boiled, stewed or added to soup. Pickles and pickles are not allowed.
dietList.introduction: A cucumber diet, like kefir, is a fairly simple and common way to lose weight quickly without harm to health. But it is important to understand that it is impossible to get rid of 5-10 kg of fat in 7 days, weight loss occurs due to fluid loss and fat mass, the percentage of which will be minimal. You can remove only 1, -1.5 kg of fat. But do not worry, this is a lot in volume.
dietList.menuText: The strict version of the diet is eating mainly cucumbers, you get about 600 calories per day. Such a diet is difficult to sustain, it is suitable for people with very strong health. The diet consists of 1.5 - 3 kg of cucumbers per day, a small amount of olive oil for dressing and in case of severe hunger, kefir with a low percentage of fat is occasionally allowed. To avoid possible problems, it is recommended to add fermented milk products, cereals and other vegetables and fruits to the cucumber diet. Then the calorie content rises to 1000 calories, which allows you to reduce weight and not harm to health. Between meals it is allowed to eat cucumbers in any quantity. A sparing diet for a week looks like this:

dietList.resultText: When eating mainly cucumbers, that is, in full observance of the mono-diet, it is possible to reduce weight by 10 kilograms per week. But it should be borne in mind that part of this is the extra water left, and not everything lost is exactly fat Such a dramatic weight loss is quite dangerous for health. A safer variant of a diet with the addition of protein food gives less results, up to 6 - 7 kg, but it is more stable and does less harm.

Most of the diet consists of fruits, vegetables, vegetable fats and proteins, and sweets and fatty meats are removed.
The process of losing weight goes on by itself without hunger and stress, due to the consumption of low-calorie, healthy food and the elimination of unhealthy foods
On such a diet, you can live and eat so constantly with the benefits of oranism, unlike many other diets. Gradually, metabolic problems will level out, and the weight will return to normal

Also, those who are used to sweetening tea and eating cakes will find it difficult to abruptly unlearn this, since sweets are prohibited during the diet. We advise you to do this gradually, reducing the daily dose of sugar little by little - then there will be no temptation to break loose and the stress of stopping the usual dose of sugar will be minimized.

dietList.introduction: The Mediterranean diet is based on the diet of villagers who ate what they grew themselves. The UN recognized that in the modern world this way of life is threatened with extinction and in 2013 inscribed the Mediterranean diet in the UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage of Cyprus. , in Croatia, Spain, Greece, Italy, Morocco and Portugal.
dietList.menuText: The menu is characterized by a large amount of lean fish and seafood, 4-6 times a week. Fish is replacing the usual fried cutlets and pork, which are prohibited. Lean beef, chicken, turkey and rabbit can be eaten. Also, the amount of dairy products without additives with a low percentage of fat.Dairy products and fruits can be eaten every day, but only unsweetened Simple carbohydrates - sweets, sugar, are replaced by complex ones: whole grain pasta, coarse bread, cereals.Fat hard cheeses are replaced by low-fat cheeses - mozzarella, cottage cheese . Potatoes and sweet fruits like bananas should be very limited. Alcohol, fatty, spicy is prohibited. You can only dry wine no more than a glass a day.
dietList.resultText: As a result of the diet, there is a very smooth weight loss without the slightest harm to the body, and the lost kilograms do not return immediately after stopping the diet, since the body did not experience stress. However, special weight loss cannot be achieved, since the diet does not limit the diet. , but rather is the basis for a rational, healthy diet. A weekly loss of up to 3 kg is possible. The Mediterranean diet can be used for a gradual transition to a permanent balanced diet.

dietList.shortIntroduction: The Mediterranean diet is inherently a balanced, healthy diet
dietList.title: Mediterranean Diet

benefits: The diet is considered 'lazy' as it does not require calorie counting, dietary changes, or severe dietary restrictions.

The principle of the diet is to replace some meals with drinking water, as well as taking it before meals. Thus, the walls of the stomach are stretched and the body is deceived , the feeling of hunger is pushed back in time, forcing to eat a little less or avoid harmful snacks at the first desire.

Also, after such forced volumes of water, you will not want to drink something extra, and you will naturally be able to avoid harmful drinks: soda, sweet tea and coffee, lemonades, cocktails that give little liquid, but a lot of excess carbohydrates.
cons: Drinking an increased amount of water increases the burden on the kidneys and excretes calcium and sodium. For this reason, the diet is prohibited for kidney and genitourinary system diseases, with low mineral levels.
Certain inconveniences are caused by frequent urination.
dietList.consTitle: Cons of a diet for the lazy

cons: Although the 6-petal diet is considered a lighter version of the mono diet, it still causes a lot of stress in the body, which is deficient in certain nutrients every day.

Dishes should be prepared in a dietary way: do not fry in oil, but cook, bake Prohibited foods in the form of canned food or in marinade. dietList.hintText: It is important not to add ingredients with gluten to the dish and to study the composition: for example, do not put noodles in soup with meatballs. Replace your usual snacks with buns and cookies for fruits and vegetables.
dietList.introduction: Gluten is a certain type of protein that is found in wheat, rye, barley, spelled and other grains. It is this protein, which is also called klekovina, helps in the formation of dough for baking - yes, thanks to it, flour, getting in contact with water, it becomes sticky and elastic.In other words, to adhere to a gluten-free diet, you need to give up all foods that contain gluten, and among them will automatically be the very ones from which we most often gain weight. These are white bread, buns , cakes, sweets, pasta and other goodies from which our priests and bellies grow.
dietList.menuText: The essence of the diet is to eliminate all foods containing gluten from the diet. The main sources are wheat, barley, rye and all foods containing them. There are a lot of restrictions and, to be sure, you need to carefully study the composition on the subject of the presence of gluten.You can not eat all the main popular cereals, except for the permitted ones: buckwheat, corn, millet, rice, flax; beans, soy flour; plus a few exotic ones, for example, tapioca and amaranth flour.Everything else: wheat, oats, etc., under In addition to cereals, their derivatives are also prohibited: kvass, beer, products with malt sugar - molasses, vinegar, flavors. On the basis of cereals, flour products, pasta, many sweets are made, so they will also have to be excluded. You can not use almost all ready-made sauces by the type of mayonnaise, bouillon cubes. Prohibited canned food and semi-finished products: sausages, sausages, sausages, crab sticks, canned vegetables and meat. tea bags, instant coffee, ice cream and yoghurts - these can also contain gluten. Below is a menu made up of the permitted foods during this diet.
dietList.menuTitle: Weekly menu for a gluten-free diet

The essence of the diet is to alternate protein and carbohydrate days. This alternation allows you to burn fat and gain muscle definition. Diet is good. It is combined with sports activities and physical activity and allows you to dry out in a short time. The principle of the LUCH diet is as follows: By restricting carbohydrates, the number of calories consumed by the body is reduced. In the absence of carbohydrates, the body begins to use glycogen reserves. manages to rebuild and begins to use fat as fuel. If carbohydrate reserves are not replenished in time, muscle cells will begin to be burned, which is very harmful. In order to avoid this, you need to eat as much protein food as possible on carbohydrate-free days. In the following days, carbohydrate loading of the body occurs. ... It deceives the body and does not put it into economy mode.
dietList.menuText: According to the theory of Jason Hunter, carbohydrates (carbohydrates) provide the body with the energy it needs to be active (and exercise). Insulin, maintained at a constant level with carbohydrates, stops fat burning. However, when proteins are consumed, the production of another hormone is activated. pancreas, glucagon. Acting in antiphase, these two hormones kill all birds with one stone - allow you to get rid of excess fat without muscle degeneration and poor health associated with a lack of energy and nutrition for the brain.
dietList.menuTitle: Weekly menu for the PCA diet
dietList.resultText: American trainer Heidi Powell, together with her husband Chris, invented her own original protein-carbohydrate alternation technique, intended primarily for those who lose weight in the gym. Its validity has been confirmed by researchers from the University Hospital of South Manchester. Observing female volunteers who combined exercise with one of two meal plans: a Mediterranean diet or a diet that significantly reduced carbohydrate intake three times a week, they concluded that the former lost an average of 2.5 kg in a month, and the latter 4, 5 kg.

In the presence of chronic diseases, the diet should be abandoned

dietList.introduction: The essence of a low-carbohydrate diet is to reduce carbohydrates in the daily diet. The main principle of such a diet is an increased intake of protein and plant foods that are rich in fiber. The daily intake of carbohydrates is 40 grams. Such a diet is popular among athletes because it makes it painless for the body. lose excess and noticeably â€œdry out.â€ With intense training, such a nutritional system can in a short time allow you to get rid of excess and achieve a more distinct muscle relief. With a low level of carbohydrates in the body, accumulated fat reserves begin to be consumed, which just leads to weight loss. But even without active exercise, you can achieve remarkable results if you follow the necessary rules. A low-carb diet is effective not only for weight loss, but also for fighting diabetes. More on this below.
dietList.menuText: Eat fractionally: 4-5 times a day, chew slowly and watch the feeling of fullness. Drink at least 2 liters of clean water a day, it speeds up metabolism and normalizes the stomach and intestines. Avoid saturated fats, which are contained in fatty meat, fast food and other junk food. Eat 3-4 hours before bedtime, leave complex carbohydrates for the first half of the day (cereals and some types of vegetables).

schemas.title: The Ducan Diet
schemas.prop: In the late 90s of the last century, French nutritionist Pierre Dukan created a low-carbohydrate diet. Its essence is that you eat a lot of protein, but selectively, and limit carbohydrates quite a lot.

schemas.title: Low carb diets
schemas.prop: Low carbohydrate diets restrict carbohydrate intake relative to the average diet. High carbohydrate foods are limited and replaced by higher fat, protein and low carbohydrate foods.

schemas.title: Mono-diets
schemas.prop: A mono diet (monotrophic diet) is a type of food that involves eating only one food item (such as potatoes or apples), or one type of food (such as fruit or meat).

schemas.title: Extreme diet
schemas.prop: Extreme diets are the hardest, but also the most productive meal plans. Suitable for infrequent use. Use such diets carefully and listen to your body

schemas.title: Therapeutic diets
schemas.prop: Therapeutic diets or medical diets are dietary regimes used for medical reasons (or medical indications and contraindications) - the treatment and prevention of diseases and their symptoms. Such diets are developed by dietitians, most often - on the basis of diagnoses of others physicians (gastroenterologists, endocrinologists, cardiologists, etc.).

schemas.title: Sparing diets
schemas.prop: Sparing diets are nutrition that fully satisfies the plastic and energy needs of the human body, its need for vitamins and other microelements, ensuring proper metabolism.

schemas.title: Old diets
schemas.prop: Old diets are outdated descriptions of diets. There is no diet tracker or detailed nutritional menu inside.

arrayOfItemOfSubsection.bodyOfText:
Duration of the diet - 6 days . & nbsp;


1st day (fish mono diet) < / p>

You can eat any kind of fish in boiled, baked or stewed form. Salt, delicate seasonings and herbs are allowed. Ukha is allowed (no potatoes and other ingredients except herbs), fish broth.


Day 2 (vegetable mono-diet)

Eat any kind of vegetables raw, boiled, baked or stewed. You can add salt and delicate seasonings, herbs. vegetable juices without additives.


3rd day (chicken mono diet)

Your delicacy on this day is chicken fillet (breast) in boiled, baked or stewed. Naturally, without skin. Salt and delicate seasonings, herbs are allowed. Chicken broth is allowed.


4th day (cereal mono-diet)

Eat any kind of cereals, cereals, sprouted seeds, seeds, cereal bread, bran, fiber. add salt, herbs. Kvass is allowed.


5th day (curd mono-diet)

Eat low-fat or low-fat cottage cheese. Low-fat milk is acceptable.


6th day (fruit mono-diet)

All types of fruits, raw or baked, are allowed. You can use spices. For example, cinnamon, vanillin, lemon zest. You can drink fruit juices without added sugar.

  • Each previous menu prepares the body for the next day's menu. For example, a fish diet on the first day a little lulls the vigilance of the body, supplying it with a significant amount of polyunsaturated fatty acids Omega-3. In addition, fish & ndash; the most light protein. So, with a small number of calories per day, the fish diet will not only bring a good plummet, but also prepare the body for vegetable dishes due to the large amount of protein.
  • On the second day, vegetables will further reduce the calorie content per day, and with this will enrich the body with useful plant carbohydrates.
  • Sugar and sugar-containing dishes are strictly prohibited!
  • It is advisable to drink as much pure water as possible, as well as green and black tea. It is better to reduce or eliminate coffee altogether.
  • After all the petals are torn off, you can cut a new flower and repeat the diet, diversifying it with new dishes from allowed products.

Contraindications: consult a specialist or nutritionist before using the diet.

An effective protein-carbohydrate diet allows you to lose up to 10 kg per week. The basic rule is to eat fractionally. The daily amount of food should be divided into 6 equal portions, the last meal no later than 18.00. Water can be use in unlimited quantities, but not less than 2 liters per day. The main product of the diet is kefir with a fat content of up to 1%. It is allowed to replace the product with natural yogurt.

Stages of the Ladder Diet

1. Cleansing

The name of the first stage or the first step speaks for itself. On this day you will be engaged in cleansing your body. The stage is very important and useful, take it seriously! It helps to enhance the effect of the following stages, gently preparing the body for weight loss. Plus at this stage there is a good cleansing of the body from toxins and toxins. And as a pleasant bonus, you can already lose from 1 to 2 kg!

2. Recovery

The second stage is designed to restore a favorable gastrointestinal environment -intestinal tract, which is also very important, both for health and for proper weight loss.At this stage you have to please your body with fermented milk products, which after the "Cleansing " stage will be absorbed by the body most effectively!

Since the diet of this day will be very low in calories, in addition to tremendous benefits for your on the intestines, you will be able to lose another 1 to 2 kg. Encouraged by your amazing results, move on to the next step.

3. Energetic

The most delicious and enjoyable stage of the Ladder diet. On this day, you have to replenish the energy reserves that the body spent on cleansing and healing, what can we hide, he was hungry and missed sugar. Therefore, on the third step, you need to please your body with glucose, until it is offended by you. Glucose will be extremely useful (raisins, honey, etc.), so it will not harm your weight loss in any way. On this sweet day, you can lose weight by about 0.5-1 kg.

4. Construction

This stage was named Construction for a reason. Its task is to help the body burn fat cells without affecting muscle mass. The active intake of protein with food will help the body to carry out the necessary "construction " work (after all, losing weight is a shock, due to which many vital functions of the body slow down), but the process of losing weight will continue! The building step will help you say goodbye to the extra 700 g.

5. Fat burning

Well, now we got to the last final stage! Here you will find useful fiber, which will help complete the process of losing weight. Fiber perfectly saturates and satisfies the feeling of hunger, but the body needs to spend a lot of energy on its digestion, and in conditions of a lack of glycogen after 4 days of a diet, it will begin to produce it from fat, actively burning it. The last step of the Ladder diet will help you to lose another 1-2.5 kg!
